short_description_localized.en: Studio Room with Two Beds - 500 Sq Ft / 46 sqm - Marble Bath - 55 gallon tub - Boudoir Chairs
short_description_localized.fr: Chambre Studio avec deux lits - 46 m² - Baignoire en marbre - Baignoire 55 gallons - Chaises Boudoir
short_description_localized.it: Camera monolocale con due letti - 500 mq / 46 mq - Bagno in marmo - Vasca da 55 galloni - Sedie boudoir

description_localized.en: Our Studio rooms offer genuine Italian luxury, with king size beds, spacious entrance foyers and seating areas, and lavish marble bathrooms. Elegant neoclassical lines work with a soothing color palette and bold Empire-style cherry wood furniture. It’s a combination of style, space and comfort seldom found in New York boutique hotels.
description_localized.fr: Nos studios offrent un luxe italien authentique, avec des lits king size, des halls d'entrée spacieux et des sièges, ainsi que des salles de bains en marbre somptueuses. Les lignes élégantes de style néoclassique se marient avec une palette de couleurs apaisante et un audacieux mobilier en cerisier de style Empire. C’est une combinaison de style, d’espace et de confort que l’on trouve rarement dans les hôtels-boutiques new-yorkais.
description_localized.it: Le nostre camere Studio offrono autentico lusso italiano, con letti king size, ampi foyer d'ingresso e aree salotto e lussuosi bagni in marmo. Eleganti linee neoclassiche funzionano con una tavolozza di colori rilassanti e audaci mobili in legno di ciliegio in stile impero. È una combinazione di stile, spazio e comfort che raramente si trova nei boutique hotel di New York.

images.name: Studio-Room-2-Beds-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 450 - 500 square foot room, featuring either two King size or two Queen size beds against the side wall separated by an elegant table with a table lamp, phone and alarm clock. A sitting bench is also situated at the foot of the bed.  Located near the window there are two comfortable armchair with an additional side table and standing lamp. The room also features an armoire, 37 inch flat screen TV and a full stocked mini bar.  The bathroom is made with Italian marble and features a 55 gallon soaking tub.
